name: City Airplane Pilot Flight Sim
description:
Welcome to the new era of airplane flying adventure, and you will experience the natural in the high sky. As a pilot, will take off from the city airport and fly in the high sky. Pick up your passengers from the airport and transfer them to your assigned location. Enjoy airplane flying pilot life and honestly perform your duties at the city airport. You will fly in the high sky and save your airplane from the mountains or other hurdles. By mistake, you will touch any obstacles, then your airplane will crash. You will enjoy multiple modes in airplane flight simulator games, and you will experience real life as the best pilot. Very careful to fly in the sky and pick the passengers from multiple city airports and safely reach your assigned locations. Accomplish multiple tasks as a pro flight pilot and try to complete them within a limited time duration. You will face lots of checkpoints, meet in the air, and safely will pass within a limited time. You will enjoy multiple scenes in this game like passenger dropping, multiple checkpoints, emergency landing, airplane parking, and night mode driving tests in this game.

Key Features:
• Collection of multiple airplanes for more fun
• Enjoy different modes like passenger dropping, checkpoints, emergency landing, airplane parking,
• Take off from the city airport and transfer them to the assigned location
• High-qualityty graphics with a 3d environment of the high sky
